turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a black and white mocha from the Starbucks on by the Locks Fair Mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please repeat the location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's by the Walmart in Wattsburg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say wilkes-barre?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Wilkes-Barre.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: like a black and white mocha, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The smallest one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What type of milks are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2%, nonfat, coconut, almond, soy and whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Glen, hold on, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are there any other flavors I could add like like honey, or whip cream, or anything like that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you can add whipped cream, honey or vanilla, hazelnut and maple syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have maple syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall black and white mocha with whole milk with maple syrup, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your coffee will be ready soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you will receive a text message with your receipt shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye!
